subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The offense crafted by the coordinator Marty Mornhinweg, who led top units in Green Bay, San Francisco and Philadelphia, has produced only 16.4 points a game for the 3-11 Jets.
snippet: The offense crafted by the coordinator Marty Mornhinweg, who led top units in Green Bay, San Francisco and Philadelphia, has produced only 16.4 points a game for the 3-11 Jets.
